```{r,eval=FALSE}
library(barsurf)
library(colorspace)

plot3d.empty()

x <- y <- 1:4
f <- function(x, y) x^2 + y^2
z <- outer(x, y, f)
plot3d.bar(, , z)

plot3d.bar(, , volcano)
plot3d.surf(, , volcano)
```
